title: Big Screen Games - Pack 1
notes: Steam has only 4 reviews (no score). Metacritic has no critic/user scores yet; small sample keeps score cautious. Steam store lists 4 user reviews and players use phones as controllers on a big shared screen.
raw_comment: 3 party games. Phones as controller. Up to 8 players. Herd Mentality - answer the same as others. Scrawl - drawing game. Can of Squirms - awkward questions where you have to choose between 2 players.
